This is a great game to play with friends or anyone! when you first start out gameplay will be difficult because you will most likely be playing with experienced players but one you get used to it you will really enjoy it. grafics are not as good as global offenceive but they are still quite good. there are a few maps and gamemodes that you are sure to enjoy as well as plenty of guns to choose from, if you are thinking of buying this game I would really recomend it.

I reccommend this game 100% to anyone. It has so many game modes such as S&D, deathmatch, RPG, warecraft, gun game ect.... it has thousands of maps and thousands of servers... The fun never ends and can easly spend hours on the game without knowing if you have spare time lol :) Big thumbs up to CSS.

это все та же контра. Трава не стала менее зееной, а пушки стреляют все так же, даже лучше. Не понимаю этих разногласий по повод, что 1.6 лучше чем сурс. играйте и побеждайте. И пусть удача всегда будет на вашей стороне!:)

Counter-Strike игра всех времен и народов!
Первая стрелялка в которую можно было играть по сети, геймеры так долго ждали и вот это случилось...
Так было много лет назад, а теперь есть достойное продолжение этой игры Counter-Strike: Source. Играть стало приятнее. Детальные прорисовки, реалестичная анимация оружия и правдоподобные звуки...
Еслибы этой игры небыло, то её стоилобы придумать!
Вперед бойцы, оставим за собой смерть и разрушения...
Just a better game than cs go

Counter-Strike Source is a great multi-player shoot 'em up game which satifies all the FPS users. I love all the different game modes and styles you can play on it, and it's deffinately worth a try.

There is so much more freedom in this game than all most any other game out there. I definitely recommend this game to must play.

One of the most challenging shooters to ever grace the market. but be warned this game is prone to rage quit

CS:S isn't exactly the best game in the series (being a pretty much exact remake of 1.6) it was more of a bridge for the large ocean that was the time between 1.6 and Global Offensive. It does have its own unique feel to it, plus a huge amount of mods (the amazing thing called surfing, lots of custom maps, zombies, DM, etc.) and is a worthy entry to the CS series.
The best FPS game ever made! I reccomened this to any FPS lover.
i think every gamer should have this game
